articles.author: F1
articles.title: Formula 1 confirms F1 Sprint format tweaks for 2023 season - Formula 1
articles.description: Formula 1 has confirmed adjustments to the F1 Sprint format for the six events that will be staged across the 2023 season, beginning with this weekend’s Azerbaijan Grand Prix.
articles.content:
Formula 1 has confirmed adjustments to the F1 Sprint format for the six events that will be staged across the 2023 season, beginning with this weekends Azerbaijan Grand Prix.
